version_description:
- Now could get verified through advanced and fiat verification

- Regular performance improvements, and bug fixes

1. Now you can buy Bitcoin (BTC)/Ethereum (ETH) through ACH, bank transfer, or debit card. Just a few clicks to buy crypto coins into your wallet.
2. Fast, safe and seamless access to over 30+ digital assets with USD.
3. We start a new referral program “Invite your friends and earn up to 40% trading fees.
4. Improvements to the KYC process. Sign up and trade after in-app account verification.

- Smoother experiences for verification
- Minor interface bug fixed and regular improvements

This Binance.US release is packed full of goodies. Have you ever wanted more banks to choose from? We got you. Were you thinking fiat verification could really take things to the next level? We’re on the same page. Bugs? Oh we got rid of those. And you’ll never believe our performance - better than ever. So what are you waiting for?! Update your app and get back to trading in style.
·More banks supported for easy selection
·In-app fiat verification improvements
·Bug fixes
·Performance improvements

We know you’re busy and have things to do. That’s why packed this release with Recurring Buy Orders in the Buy Crypto experience. Choose from over a dozen cryptocurrencies, set the frequency you like best and we’ll do the rest. Automatically dollar cost average your way in and out of your prefered digital assets.

- Improved security measures
- Bug fixes

1. Performance enhancement
2. Bug squashing
1. Performance enhancement
Your new favorite app for cryptocurrency trading. A new take on the functionalities you love, now with improved user experience and cutting edge design.
